    "body": "<a id='comment:5'></a>\nLooks good to me. It is absurd that Sage doesn't recognize that the ideal {{{(2, 3, 1)}} of the integers mod 4 is the whole ring, but that is nothing to do with this patch.",
    "created_at": "2011-12-25T15:21:08Z",
    "formatter": "markdown",

<a id='comment:5'></a>
Looks good to me. It is absurd that Sage doesn't recognize that the ideal {{{(2, 3, 1)}} of the integers mod 4 is the whole ring, but that is nothing to do with this patch.
